reviews.review_content:
Prof. Elmachtoub is an incredible teacher and actually wants the class to learn and embrace the material in a way that few others at this school do. He's surprisingly friendly and very personable, and delivers lectures incredibly clearly.
Workload:
5-6 Homeworks, some relatively quick and some can take 6-7 hours. Go to office hours and you'll get significant help from the TAs. Two midterms and a final project that can vary wildly in the amount of work. No final.
